html: We require sex offenders to register because it WORKS. It shouldn’t matter if they’re here legally or illegally – rapists and child molesters are a threat regardless immigration status. Those here illegally shouldn't be given an opportunity to bypass registration requirements.
text: We require sex offenders to register because it WORKS. It shouldn’t matter if they’re here legally or illegally – rapists and child molesters are a threat regardless immigration status. Those here illegally shouldn't be given an opportunity to bypass registration requirements.

html: My bill – HR 6595, the Sex Offender Registration & Victim Protection Act (SORVPA) – strengthens accountability in #ICE’s handling of sex offenders, promotes better communication with local law enforcement, enhances public safety & empowers future victims→ https://www.congress.gov/115/bills/hr6595/BILLS-115hr6595ih.xml …
text: My bill – HR 6595, the Sex Offender Registration & Victim Protection Act (SORVPA) – strengthens accountability in #ICE’s handling of sex offenders, promotes better communication with local law enforcement, enhances public safety & empowers future victims→ https://www.congress.gov/115/bills/hr6595/BILLS-115hr6595ih.xml …

html: Tragically, #ICE’s process for releasing sex offenders is overly complex & seriously flawed. As a result, local law enforcement too often don't even know these criminals are in the community, allowing them to avoid registration. I’ve introduced new legislation to set this right.
text: Tragically, #ICE’s process for releasing sex offenders is overly complex & seriously flawed. As a result, local law enforcement too often don't even know these criminals are in the community, allowing them to avoid registration. I’ve introduced new legislation to set this right.

html: It’s all too easy for dangerous criminals to slip through the cracks & avoid registering as sex offenders. html: The conservative principles embodied in the Securing America's Future Act are the right solution & should be the foundation of any future immigration bill. The 193 votes in support of it today prove that we’re close and, with a few tweaks, we could get it across the finish line.
text: The conservative principles embodied in the Securing America's Future Act are the right solution & should be the foundation of any future immigration bill. The 193 votes in support of it today prove that we’re close and, with a few tweaks, we could get it across the finish line.

html: For decades, America has felt the repercussions of a failed, outdated immigration system that has rewarded those who enter this country illegally. While I am disappointed that the Securing America’s Future Act narrowly failed, I will continue to work with my colleagues.
text: For decades, America has felt the repercussions of a failed, outdated immigration system that has rewarded those who enter this country illegally. While I am disappointed that the Securing America’s Future Act narrowly failed, I will continue to work with my colleagues.

html: In order to avoid future attacks on our planes, it’s necessary that we use both qualitative & quantitative threat assessments to ascertain which flights are most at risk. We need to be using every tool at our disposal to deter, detect, & disrupt plots to undermine our flights.

html: With escalating threats across the globe, we must remain a step ahead of our adversaries by taking precautions to protect our skies. My bill, the #StrengtheningAviationSecurityAct, will institute much-needed guidelines when it comes to where & how FAMS allocates its air marshals.
text: With escalating threats across the globe, we must remain a step ahead of our adversaries by taking precautions to protect our skies. My bill, the #StrengtheningAviationSecurityAct, will institute much-needed guidelines when it comes to where & how FAMS allocates its air marshals.
